pageProps.title: Practice Mindfulness to have better sex
pageProps.metaDesc: Do you practice mindfulness during sex? Can being mindful help increase pleasure, connection, and intimacy? The practice of mindfulness involves being open, accepting, and curious about the time at hand. It’s being non-judgmental, being present and aware in the moment. Read this article till the end because I’ll share some mindfulness practices that you can do daily which can help improve your overall mindfulness and your sexual relationships.
